solution_line_template: She bought {ounces_per_item_8oz}ounces of cheese, {ounces_per_item_8oz}-ounce raspberries, {ounces_per_item_8oz} ounces of blueberries for a total of {ounces_per_item_8oz}*{num_8oz_items} = <<{ounces_per_item_8oz}*{num_8oz_items}={total_ounces_from_8oz_items}>>{total_ounces_from_8oz_items} ounces

{ounces_in_pound} ounces are in {pounds_in_pound} pound and she has {total_ounces_from_8oz_items} ounces of food so she has {total_ounces_from_8oz_items}/{ounces_in_pound} = <<{total_ounces_from_8oz_items}/{ounces_in_pound}={pounds_from_8oz_items}>>{pounds_from_8oz_items} pounds of food

Those items are {pounds_from_8oz_items} pounds and she bought {bread_weight_pounds} pound of bread, {tomatoes_weight_pounds} pound of tomatoes, {zucchini_weight_pounds} pounds of zucchini and {chicken_weight_pounds} pounds of chicken for a total of {pounds_from_8oz_items}+{bread_weight_pounds}+{tomatoes_weight_pounds}+{zucchini_weight_pounds}+{chicken_weight_pounds} = <<{pounds_from_8oz_items}+{bread_weight_pounds}+{tomatoes_weight_pounds}+{zucchini_weight_pounds}+{chicken_weight_pounds}={total_food_pounds}>>{total_food_pounds} pounds of food
